Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository

Class CollaboratorRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository.CollaboratorRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CollaboratorRepository extends Object implements Serializable
Repository class responsible for managing collaborator data.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollaboratorRepository

      public CollaboratorRepository()

  • Method Details

    • registerCollaborator

      public Optional<Collaborator> registerCollaborator(String name, String birthdate, String admissionDate, String address, int phoneNumber, String email, int taxpayerNumber, String identificationDocumentType, String identificationDocumentNumber, Job job)
      Registers a new collaborator with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the collaborator.
      birthdate - The birthdate of the collaborator.
      admissionDate - The admission date of the collaborator.
      address - The address of the collaborator.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the collaborator.
      email - The email of the collaborator.
      taxpayerNumber - The taxpayer number of the collaborator.
      identificationDocumentType - The type of identification document of the collaborator.
      identificationDocumentNumber - The identification document number of the collaborator.
      job - The job of the collaborator.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the newly registered collaborator, if registration was successful.

    • assignSkill

      public Optional<Collaborator> assignSkill(Collaborator collaborator, List<Skill> selectedSkillsList)
      Assigns skills to a collaborator.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator to assign skills to.
      selectedSkillsList - The list of skills to assign.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the updated collaborator with assigned skills.

    • removeAlreadyAssignedSkills

      public List<Skill> removeAlreadyAssignedSkills(String collaboratorIdNumber, List<Skill> skills)
      Removes the skills already assigned to the collaborator identified by the provided identification number from the given list of skills.
      Parameters:
      collaboratorIdNumber - The identification number of the collaborator whose assigned skills are to be removed.
      skills - The list of skills to remove already assigned skills from.
      Returns:
      The updated list of skills after removing the assigned skills of the collaborator.

    • getCollaborators

      public List<Collaborator> getCollaborators()
      Retrieves a defensive copy of the list of collaborators.
      Returns:
      A list of Collaborator objects.

    • getCollaboratorByIdNumber

      public Collaborator getCollaboratorByIdNumber(String collaboratorIdNumber)
      Retrieves a collaborator by their identification number.
      Parameters:
      collaboratorIdNumber - The identification number of the collaborator.
      Returns:
      The Collaborator object corresponding to the provided identification number.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the collaborator is not found.

    • createTempCollaboratorsList

      public List<Collaborator> createTempCollaboratorsList()
      Creates a temporary list of collaborators, which can be used for operations such as team generation.
      Returns:
      A list of Collaborator objects.

    • generateTeam

      public List<Collaborator> generateTeam(List<Skill> selectedSkillsList, int minTeamSize, int maxTeamSize)
      Generates a team of collaborators based on selected skills and team size constraints.
      Parameters:
      selectedSkillsList - The list of skills required for the team.
      minTeamSize - The minimum size of the team.
      maxTeamSize - The maximum size of the team.
      Returns:
      A list of Collaborator objects representing the proposed team.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if not all required skills are covered or if there are insufficient collaborators to form the team.
